phrs.translation: 对专家的评论进行评论

sentences.sentence: After critiquing the so-called thin ideal by writing essays and role playing with their peers, participants are directed to come up with and execute small, nonviolent acts.
sentences.translation: 在通过写论文、和同伴们进行角色扮演来批评所谓的“渺茫理想”之后，参与者们被要求提出并执行一些小规模的非暴力行为。

sentences.sentence: Her job involves critiquing designs by fashion students.
sentences.translation: 她的工作包括评判时装专业学生的设计。

sentences.sentence: Critiquing your own sketches, including the odd mirror sketch, can generate a lot more ideas.
sentences.translation: 批判一下自己的草图(包括从镜子中看到的那张)，这可以使你产生更多的想法。
